tree.name: Harrison Barnes
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team sign-and-trade: SAS sign-and-traded DeRozan to CHI, SAC sent Barnes + 2031 1st swap to SAS, SAC traded Duarte + picks + cash to CHI
tree.note: Forward originally drafted 7th overall by Golden State in 2012

assetsGivenUp.name: DeMar DeRozan
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Spurs acquired DeRozan + Poeltl from Raptors for Leonard + Green
assetsGivenUp.note: All-Star guard originally drafted 9th overall by Toronto in 2009. Sign-and-traded to Chicago as part of this 3-team deal.

assetsGivenUp.name: Kawhi Leonard
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Draft-night trade: Spurs acquired Leonard from Pacers for George Hill
assetsGivenUp.note: Forward drafted 15th overall by Indiana, immediately traded to San Antonio

assetsGivenUp.name: George Hill
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted 26th overall by San Antonio from IUPUI

assetsGivenUp.name: Danny Green
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed as undrafted free agent after being waived by Cleveland
